fullplot: In the Fabulous Thirties, Doc Savage and his five Amazing Adventurers are sucked into the mystery of Doc's father disappearing in the wilds of South America. The maniacal Captain Seas tries to thwart them at every turn as they travel to the country of Hidalgo to investigate Doc's father's death and uncover a vast horde of Incan gold.
plot: Doc and the Amazing Five battle Captain Seas and "the green death" for control of a fabulous resource.
title: Doc Savage: The Man of Bronze
